column6: A Sorcerer Supreme is chosen! Be witness to a very important chapter in Avengers history and the lore of Marvel magic!  Plus, the Avengers finally have a big showdown with the Hood and not everyone walks away from it unharmed! Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | inker:Matt Banning | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Justin Ponsor | penciller:Billy Tan
